Disease.Name: AROMATASE DEFICIENCY
Disease.Synonym: AROMATASE; GYNECOMASTIA DUE TO INCREASED AROMATASE ACTIVITY
Disease.Summary: rare ;autosomal recessive ;mutation in the CYP19A1 gene;increased aromatase activity ->gynecomastia -decreased aromatase acitivity -> aromatase deficiency syndrome aromatase enzyme complex catalyzes the conversion of androgens to estrogen (ovary, testis, placenta, brain, adipose tissue)
